game.name: Blackjack Trainer
game.shortDescription: Master blackjack from the basics to strategy and card counting. BLACKJACK TRAINER helps you sharpen skills, practice under your desired conditions to turn knowledge into an unbeatable edge..
game.shortDescriptionEn: Master blackjack from the basics to strategy and card counting. BLACKJACK TRAINER helps you sharpen skills, practice under your desired conditions to turn knowledge into an unbeatable edge..
